word: H5708 - עֵד - ʻêd - ayd - Filthy - அசுத்தமான

sections.paragraph: menstruation; a filthy rag, a stained garment (figurative of the best deeds of guilty people)
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From an unused root meaning to set a period (compare H5710 and H5749); the menstrual flux (as periodical); by implication (in plural) soiling: - filthy.
Cognate: H5708, H5714
